articles.title: Pakistan Board Fumes Over Najam Sethi's "Misquoted" ODI World Cup Comments - NDTV Sports
articles.description: The PCB and BCCI have been in discussions with the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) over an appropriate model for the Asia Cup.
articles.content: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) and the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) have been in discussions with the Asian Cricket Council (ACC) over an appropriate model for the Asia Cup which is… [+1847 chars]
